first_para: Martin Charles Horwood (born 12 October 1962, Cheltenham) is a British Liberal Democrat politician.

full.extract:
Martin Charles Horwood (born 12 October 1962, Cheltenham) is a British Liberal Democrat politician.
He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for the Cheltenham constituency. He is the founder and current chairman of the All-Party Parliamentary Group for Tribal Peoples.
full.title: Martin Horwood
